part1content: Check out the latest news and events about us below. Feel free to subscribe our monthly mail news and product information if you would like to know us more.

part2data.headline: Q&Aï¼šCan I email my favorite show or host?
part2data.text:
Definitely! Most shows have an option to send them a message on their website and are happy to hear from you.

Here is a full list of the shows: http://www.foxnews.com/shows/index.html

If you're on Twitter, feel free to "tweet" at our different hosts as well. They've often got Twitter open while they're on the air. Here is a list of all our on-air talent: http://www.foxnews.com/on-air/personalities

You can also reach out to them via Facebook.
